title: Restaurant Order [WIP]
body: New implementation of the restaurant order application. Currently under development (as of 25.10.2024). It will have 1 NestJS Backend and 3 Vue-Frontends.

title: LOEM - LADR
body: Implementation of Frontend with modern UI of an Labor Order Entry Module. Doctors and Medical Practices can manage laboratory orders digitally.

title: gusStudio/gusClient
body: Developed an application which can: Send, receive, sign, and manage KIM, KVC, and email messages, e-doctor letters, and SMS. Creating various invoices.

title: Matjo Restaurant
body: Website of a new local business in Dresden specializing in bbq and hotpots.

title: Ramen1974
body: Website of a local business in Dresden specializing in Ramen.

title: Anamit
body: Website of a local business in Dresden specializing in vietnamese cuisine.

title: Aroi Thai Cuisine
body: Implementation and design of the frontend of a local business in Dresden specializing in thai cuisine.

title: Restaurant Order Old
body: Implementation of a restaurant order application with Vue.js and Firebase. Due to time constraints, the application is not fully functional and will be replaced with another Tech-Stack.

title: Communardo
body: Implementation of the complete frontend of the new website of Communardo. Design was provided by a very talented team-colleague.

title: Lidl-gesagt-getan
body: Complete rebrush of the corporate design of the Lidl Gesagt-Getan website. The website is specialized on Corporate Social Responsibility.

title: ready for green
body: Complete rebrush of the the website of the Schwarz Group's sustainability initiative. It's about mobility in rural areas.
